security.title: Security First
security.description: All API credentials are encrypted end-to-end. We recommend using sub-accounts with limited permissions and IP whitelisting.

dialog.title: Add Exchange Account
dialog.description: Your API credentials are encrypted before storage
dialog.mnemonicPlaceholder: Enter your 12 or 24 word seed phrase
dialog.mnemonicHint: Enter your wallet's seed phrase (12 or 24 words separated by spaces)
dialog.passphraseHint: Required for OKX, Bitget, and KuCoin. Set during API key creation.
dialog.encryptionNote: Credentials are encrypted with AES-256-GCM before storage

newPage.basicInfoDesc: Set up your account name and exchange
newPage.securitySubtitle: Learn how we protect your credentials
newPage.transportEnabledDesc: API keys are encrypted in the browser before transmission using RSA-OAEP + AES-256-GCM
newPage.transportDisabledDesc: API keys are protected by TLS during transmission and encrypted at rest on the server
newPage.hyperliquidInfo: Hyperliquid is a decentralized perpetual exchange. You can import your wallet using a private key or seed phrase.
newPage.cexInfo: Generate API credentials from your exchange settings. Make sure to enable trading permissions but disable withdrawal.
newPage.connectionFailed: Account created, but connection test failed. Please check your credentials

serverIP.title: Server Outbound IP
serverIP.description: Add this IP to your exchange API whitelist

guide.tipTestnet: Start with testnet mode to practice first
guide.tipSubaccountDesc: Create a restricted subaccount for enhanced security.
guide.tipPassphrase: Passphrase is the third credential, keep it safe
guide.tipSecret: Secret Key is shown only once, save it immediately!
guide.encryptionNote: Your credentials are encrypted with AES-256-GCM in the database for maximum security.
guide.ipWhitelistNote: Strongly recommended to bind server IP whitelist for better API security.

binance.step5: Save your API Key and Secret Key
binance.contractNote: Make sure USDT-M Futures trading is enabled and you have funds in the Futures account.
binance.tipTestnet: Start with testnet mode to practice first
binance.tipSecret: Secret Key is shown only once, save it immediately!

bybit.step3: Click "Create New Key", select "System-generated API Key"
bybit.step5: Save your API Key and Secret Key
bybit.tipProxy: May require a proxy in certain regions
bybit.tipSecret: Secret Key is shown only once, save it immediately!

okx.step4: Set a Passphrase (OKX's unique third credential)
okx.step6: Save your API Key, Secret Key, and Passphrase
okx.tipPassphrase: Passphrase is required when adding your account
okx.tipProxy: May require a proxy in certain regions
okx.tipSave: Save all three credentials: API Key, Secret Key, and Passphrase!

bitget.step3: Click "Create API", set Passphrase and permissions
bitget.step4: Save API Key, Secret Key, and Passphrase
bitget.passphraseNote: Passphrase is required for Bitget API access. Set it during API key creation and keep it safe.
bitget.note: Make sure to enable USDT-M Futures trading and deposit funds to your Futures account.

kucoin.step3: Click "Create API", set Passphrase and permissions
kucoin.step4: Save API Key, Secret Key, and Passphrase
kucoin.passphraseNote: Passphrase is required for KuCoin API access. You set it when creating the API key.
kucoin.note: KuCoin Futures uses a separate account. Transfer funds to your Futures account before trading.

gate.step4: Save API Key and Secret Key
gate.note: Gate.io Futures requires funds in your Futures account. Transfer USDT from Spot to Futures.

hyperliquid.title: Hyperliquid is a decentralized exchange. Instead of API Keys, it uses Ethereum private key to sign transactions.
hyperliquid.privateKeyGuide: Export your private key from an Ethereum wallet (e.g. MetaMask) and paste it into the "Private Key" field.
hyperliquid.mnemonicGuide: Prepare your 12 or 24-word seed phrase and paste it into the "Mnemonic" field. The system will derive the private key via BIP-44 path automatically.
hyperliquid.securityNote: Use a dedicated trading wallet — do not use your main wallet. Private keys and seed phrases are encrypted with AES-256-GCM in the database.
hyperliquid.fundingNote: Deposit USDC from Arbitrum to Hyperliquid on the Hyperliquid app. Make sure your account has enough USDC for trading.

indicators.description: Configure the technical indicators for market analysis

ema.title: Exponential Moving Average
ema.description: Trend-following indicator that gives more weight to recent prices

rsi.title: Relative Strength Index
rsi.description: Momentum oscillator measuring speed and change of price movements

macd.title: MACD
macd.description: Trend-following momentum indicator showing relationship between two EMAs

riskControls.title: Risk Controls
riskControls.description: Set hard limits that the AI will never exceed
riskControls.maxLeverageTooltip: Maximum leverage the AI can use for any position
riskControls.maxPositionRatioTooltip: Maximum margin (collateral) for a single position as percentage of equity. With leverage, the actual position value = margin × leverage.
riskControls.maxTotalExposureTooltip: Maximum total exposure across all positions
riskControls.minRiskRewardTooltip: Minimum risk-to-reward ratio required for trades
riskControls.maxDrawdownTooltip: Trading pauses if drawdown exceeds this threshold
riskControls.minConfidenceTooltip: Trades below this confidence level will be skipped
riskControls.defaultSlAtrTooltip: When AI does not provide a stop loss, the system auto-fills using this ATR multiplier. E.g. 1.5 means stop loss = entry ± 1.5 × ATR.
riskControls.defaultTpAtrTooltip: When AI does not provide a take profit, the system auto-fills using this ATR multiplier. E.g. 3.0 means take profit = entry ± 3.0 × ATR.
riskControls.maxSlPercentTooltip: Hard cap on stop loss distance as a percentage of entry price, to prevent excessively wide stop losses when ATR is abnormally high.
riskControls.highRiskWarning: Your current settings indicate high risk. Consider reducing leverage and position sizes.
riskControls.modeMismatchConservative: Risk settings are more aggressive than typical for Conservative mode.
riskControls.modeMismatchAggressive: Risk settings are more conservative than typical for Aggressive mode.
riskControls.modeMismatchBalanced: Risk settings are outside the typical range for Balanced mode.
riskControls.presetMismatch: Current risk settings deviate from the selected preset ({preset}): {details}. Ignore if intentional.

capitalAllocation.title: Capital Allocation
capitalAllocation.description: Assign a dedicated capital budget to this strategy to prevent interference between strategies
capitalAllocation.percentAmountTooltip: Percentage of account equity, e.g. 30% means using 30% of account funds
capitalAllocation.warning: Account capital allocation exceeds safe threshold. New positions will be blocked

promptEditor.title: Prompt Builder
promptEditor.description: Customize the AI's trading behavior and decision process
promptEditor.customPromptPlaceholder: Describe your trading strategy in natural language. Be specific about entry/exit conditions, risk management, and market conditions...
promptEditor.customPromptHint: This is appended to the system prompt. Be specific about your trading style and preferences.
promptEditor.advancedModePlaceholder:
Write your complete prompt content here...

Example:
## Role Definition
You are a professional cryptocurrency trader...

## Trading Mode
...
promptEditor.advancedModeHint: Note: The system will automatically append Hard Constraints and Output Format at the end, so you don't need to worry about section numbers. Just focus on writing your trading strategy content.

placeholders.roleDefinition: Define the AI's role and expertise...

hints.roleDefinition: Leave empty to use default role definition
hints.tradingFrequency: Leave empty to use default frequency guidelines
hints.entryStandards: Leave empty to use default entry standards
hints.decisionProcess: Leave empty to use default decision process

promptEditor.conflictWithConservative: Your custom instructions may conflict with the current Conservative trading mode. The system will follow the trading mode first.
promptEditor.conflictWithAggressive: Your custom instructions may conflict with the current Aggressive trading mode. The system will follow the trading mode first.
promptEditor.conflictWithBalanced: Your custom instructions may conflict with the current Balanced mode. The system will follow the trading mode first.
promptEditor.suggestTradingModeConservative: Conservative template applied. Consider switching the trading mode above to Conservative for consistency.
promptEditor.suggestTradingModeMomentum: Momentum template applied. For more active trading, consider switching the trading mode to Moderate or Aggressive.

preview.title: Prompt Preview
preview.description: Preview the complete system prompt that will be sent to the AI
preview.testHint: Test with mock market data to see how the AI would respond

debate.title: Multi-Model Debate
debate.description: Let multiple AI models analyze and debate to reach consensus
debate.enableDescription: Multiple AI models will analyze the market in parallel and vote on decisions
debate.selectModelsDescription: Choose 2-5 AI models to participate in the debate
debate.minModelsWarning: At least 2 models are required for debate mode
debate.addModelLink: Add a model in Model Management
debate.minParticipantsDescription: Minimum number of models that must respond successfully for a valid debate

quantStrategies.title: Quant Strategies
quantStrategies.subtitle: Create and manage traditional quantitative trading strategies
quantStrategies.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this strategy?

info.title: Traditional Quant Strategies
info.description: Rule-based automated trading: Grid, DCA, and RSI strategies execute deterministic trading logic without AI.

typeDescriptions.ai: Use AI to analyze markets and make autonomous trading decisions based on your natural language instructions.
typeDescriptions.grid: Profit from market volatility by creating a grid of buy/sell orders within a price range.
typeDescriptions.dca: Dollar-cost average into a position with scheduled orders, and sell when take-profit is reached.
typeDescriptions.rsi: Trade based on RSI indicator values — buy when oversold, sell when overbought.

strategyPreset.title: Strategy Style
strategyPreset.description: Choose your investment style and time horizon to auto-fill all parameters

riskProfile.title: Investment Style
riskProfile.conservativeDesc: Low leverage, small positions, high confidence threshold
riskProfile.balancedDesc: Moderate parameters, suitable for most users
riskProfile.aggressiveDesc: High leverage, large positions, lower confidence threshold

timeHorizon.title: Time Horizon
timeHorizon.swingDesc: 15m/1h/4h intraday to multi-day, ride the trend
timeHorizon.positionDesc: 4h/1d hold for weeks, capture major trends

strategyPreset.customDesc: Skip presets, configure all parameters manually

hero.subtitle: Connect to global leading exchanges with one click, intelligent strategies execute automatically, reach optimal trading decisions through multi-model consensus algorithms, empowering your trading with AI.

exchanges.title: Multi-Exchange Support
exchanges.desc: Connect to Binance, Bybit, OKX, Hyperliquid with one click

coreCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
coreCapabilities.subtitle: Three core engines building intelligent trading system

nlp.title: Intelligent Strategy Generation Engine
nlp.desc: Natural language-based strategy definition engine. AI deeply understands trading intent, transforming natural language into executable strategies through 8-segment Prompt building mechanism, enabling complex trading logic without coding

debate.title: Multi-Model Consensus Decision Engine
debate.desc: Multi-model parallel analysis engine. Through consensus algorithms including vote, confidence, weighted, unanimous, it aggregates wisdom from multiple AI models to reach optimal trading decisions, significantly enhancing accuracy and reliability

backtest.title: Quantitative Backtesting Validation Engine
backtest.desc: Historical data-based strategy validation engine. Through simulated execution and multi-dimensional performance analysis, provides professional metrics including Sharpe ratio, max drawdown, win rate, ensuring thorough validation before live trading

capabilities.title: Learn More
capabilities.subtitle: Complete capabilities from strategy to execution

strategy.title: Natural Language Strategy Definition
strategy.desc: Describe trading logic in plain language. AI understands your intent and generates executable strategies — no coding required

analysis.title: Real-time Data Collection & Analysis
analysis.desc: Fetch real-time prices and K-line data, calculate technical indicators like EMA, RSI, MACD, ATR to provide data for AI decisions

decision.title: Multi-Model Debate Engine
decision.desc: Multiple AI models analyze markets in parallel, reaching optimal decisions through consensus modes: vote, confidence, weighted, unanimous

risk.title: Smart Risk Control & Decision Parsing
risk.desc: Automatically parse AI decisions, validate risk control rules including leverage limits, position limits, max drawdown to ensure trading safety

execution.title: Multi-Exchange Unified Execution
execution.desc: Submit decisions to Binance, Bybit, OKX, Hyperliquid through unified API interface, automatically manage orders

backtest.title: Historical Backtesting & Performance Analysis
backtest.desc: Simulate strategy execution on historical data, provide multi-dimensional performance metrics including Sharpe ratio, max drawdown, win rate

cta.title: Get Started
cta.subtitle: Embark on a new era of intelligent trading, explore infinite possibilities powered by AI

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.subtitle: View P&L and performance for accounts and strategies
